notes.en: Very common in supermarkets and shops. Look for "in de aanbieding" or "bonusaanbieding" on discount products.
notes.zh: 超市和商店里非常常见，比如货架上的 "in de aanbieding" 或 Albert Heijn 的 "bonus" 特价。

notes.en: Used in expressions like "Let op!" (pay attention) and "aandacht besteden aan" (to pay attention to something).
notes.zh: 常见搭配有 "Let op!"（注意！）和 "aandacht besteden aan..."（对…给予关注）。

translations.zh: 愉快的 / 令人舒服的

notes.en: Formal way to say "Nice to meet you" when you introduce yourself: "Aangenaam".
notes.zh: 正式场合自我介绍时常说 "Aangenaam"，相当于“幸会 / 很高兴认识你”。

notes.en: Used for yourself ("Ik kleed me aan") or for children ("Ik kleed de kinderen aan").
notes.zh: 可以说 "Ik kleed me aan"（我穿衣服），也可以说 "Ik kleed de kinderen aan"（我给孩子穿衣）。

notes.en: On timetables you see "vertrek" (departure) and "aankomst" (arrival).
notes.zh: 在时刻表上常见与 "vertrek"（出发）相对的 "aankomst"（到达）。

notes.en: Traditional Dutch staple food, often eaten cooked or as mashed potatoes ("aardappelpuree").
notes.zh: 传统主食之一，经常煮着吃，或做成土豆泥 (aardappelpuree)。

notes.en: Popular summer fruit, used on bread, in desserts or with whipped cream.
notes.zh: 夏天常见的水果，可切片放在面包上，或做甜点、配奶油。

translations.zh: 订阅 / 月票 / 年票

notes.en: Used for phone contracts, internet, public transport (OV-abonnement) or gym membership.
notes.zh: 常用于手机、宽带、公共交通 (OV-abonnement) 或健身房等长期订阅。

notes.en: Person who plays a role in films, series or theatre.
notes.zh: 在电影、电视剧或舞台剧中表演角色的人。

translations.zh: 促销 / 行动 / 活动

notes.en: "In de actie" often means a product is cheaper; it can also mean a campaign or protest action.
notes.zh: 在超市里 "in de actie" 多指商品在打折；也可以指某个活动或抗议行动。

notes.en: Used for people and things: "actief zijn" (to be active), "actieve vakantie" (active holiday).
notes.zh: 既可形容人也可形容事：例如 "actief zijn"（很积极）、"actieve vakantie"（动来动去的假期）。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! It does NOT mean "actual" (which is "feitelijk" or "echt"). It means "current".
notes.zh: 假朋友！不等于 "actual"(实际的)。它的意思是"当前的"或"最新的"。

notes.en: In expressions like "haal diep adem" (take a deep breath) or "buiten adem" (out of breath).
notes.zh: 常见搭配："haal diep adem"（深呼吸）、"buiten adem"（喘不过气）。

notes.en: You see adverts in newspapers, online (bijvoorbeeld op Marktplaats) or on the street.
notes.zh: 可以是报纸广告、网上广告（例如 Marktplaats 上的商品信息）或街头海报。

notes.en: "Advies vragen" means to ask someone for advice, for example a doctor, teacher or friend.
notes.zh: "advies vragen" 表示向别人征求意见，比如问医生、老师或朋友的建议。

notes.en: Used for picking up parcels (pakket afhalen) or takeaway food ("afhaalchinees" for Chinese takeaway).
notes.zh: 常用于取包裹 (pakket afhalen) 或买外卖，比如 "afhaalchinees"（中餐外卖店）。

translations.en: to pay the bill / to settle up

notes.en: In shops or restaurants: "Zullen we even afrekenen?" (Shall we pay the bill?).
notes.zh: 在商店或餐厅常听到："Zullen we even afrekenen?"（我们去结个账吧？）。

notes.en: Often used as "de tafel afruimen" after dinner.
notes.zh: 经常说 "de tafel afruimen"，指吃完饭后把餐桌收拾干净。

translations.en: to say goodbye / to take leave

notes.en: Used when leaving a job, moving house or at a funeral: "afscheid nemen van iemand".
notes.zh: 在离职、搬家或葬礼等场景常用，表达和某人或某个阶段道别。

notes.en: Essential Dutch custom. Always make an appointment before visiting friends or professionals (doctor, job interview).
notes.zh: 荷兰社交和商务的基本要求。拜访（op bezoek）或看医生前必须预约.

notes.en: During COVID you often heard "1,5 meter afstand houden" (keep 1.5 metres distance).
notes.zh: 新冠期间常听到 "1,5 meter afstand houden"（保持 1.5 米距离）。

notes.en: Used for TV, set-top box or other devices: "Waar is de afstandsbediening?"
notes.zh: 常指电视或机顶盒的遥控器："Waar is de afstandsbediening?"（遥控器在哪？）。

notes.en: "Appeltaart" (apple pie) with whipped cream.
notes.zh: "Appeltaart" (苹果派) 配鲜奶油。

translations.zh: 盒子 / 碗 / 垃圾桶

notes.en: Not "back". A versatile word for any container. "Vuilnisbak" (trash bin), "bakje koffie" (cup of coffee).
notes.zh: 不是 "back"。指各种容器。"Vuilnisbak"(垃圾桶)，口语也常说 "bakje koffie"(一杯咖啡)。

notes.en: Easy fruit.
notes.zh: 方便吃的水果。

notes.en: For children aged 4 to 12 (Groep 1 to Groep 8). Free, but schools ask for a voluntary parental contribution (ouderbijdrage).
notes.zh: 4 至 12 岁儿童就读。学校本身免费，但会要求家长自愿支付杂费 (**ouderbijdrage**)。

notes.en: Penalty for minor offenses like illegal parking, traffic violations, or not carrying ID (from 14 years old).
notes.zh: 对轻微违法行为（如交通违规、未携带身份证件）的惩罚。

notes.en: Can be calling by phone or ringing a doorbell ("aanbellen").
notes.zh: 既是"打电话"，也是"按门铃"。

notes.en: Place where you buy fuel for your car; also sells snacks and drinks.
notes.zh: 给汽车加油的地方，通常也卖零食和饮料。

notes.en: Traditional treat for newborn babies. Blue (boy) or pink (girl) sprinkles.
notes.zh: 庆祝新生儿的传统食物。糖屑为粉色（女孩）或蓝色（男孩）。

notes.en: You can pay by card ("pinnen") or cash ("contant").
notes.zh: 可以刷卡("pinnen")或付现("contant")。

notes.en: May 5th. Celebrating the end of WWII.
notes.zh: 每年 5 月 5 日。庆祝二战结束。

notes.en: "Fluitje" or "vaasje" (types of beer glasses).
notes.zh: "Fluitje" 或 "vaasje" (不同种类的啤酒杯)。

notes.en: Colour of the Tax Office envelopes.
notes.zh: 税务局信封的颜色。

notes.en: Specific for groceries. "Winkelen" is shopping for clothes/fun.
notes.zh: 专指买菜/日用品。"Winkelen" 通常指逛街买衣服。

notes.en: Big cart you push in the supermarket for your groceries.
notes.zh: 超市里推着装购物物品的大购物车。

notes.en: List you make before going to the supermarket so you don’t forget what to buy.
notes.zh: 去超市前写的购物清单，避免忘记要买的东西。

notes.en: Informal drinks with colleagues or friends, usually with snacks ("borrelhapjes"). "Vrijdagmiddagborrel" (Vrijmibo) is work tradition.
notes.zh: 指非正式的喝一杯。"Vrijmibo" (周五下午酒会) 是公司传统。

notes.en: "Spijkerbroek" (jeans).
notes.zh: "Spijkerbroek" (牛仔裤)。

notes.en: Small pocket in your trousers where people often keep keys or coins.
notes.zh: 裤子上的小口袋，很多人会把钥匙或硬币放在里面。

notes.en: Dutch staple food. Lunch is often bread.
notes.zh: 荷兰主食。午餐通常吃面包。

notes.en: Amsterdam has many bridges.
notes.zh: 阿姆斯特丹有很多桥。

notes.en: Bread is often brown ("bruin brood").
notes.zh: 面包通常是棕色的("bruin brood")。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! Not "brutal" (violent). It means rude or having a big mouth.
notes.zh: 假朋友！不是 "brutal"(残忍)。意思是"厚脸皮"或"无礼"。

notes.en: "Buienradar" is the most used app to check if it will rain in the next 5 mins.
notes.zh: "Buienradar" (阵雨雷达) 是荷兰人最常用的App。

notes.en: Children playing outside, for example on the street, schoolyard or playground.
notes.zh: 孩子在户外玩耍，例如在街边、学校操场或游乐场。

notes.en: People who live next to or near your house.
notes.zh: 住在你家旁边或附近的人。

notes.en: Social contact with the people living around you, for example saying hello, small talk or helping each other.
notes.zh: 与周围邻居的社交接触，例如打招呼、聊天、互相帮忙。

notes.en: Local or regional bus; you often check the timetable in an app like 9292.
notes.zh: 市内或区域公交车，时刻表常用 9292 等 APP 查询。

notes.en: Where you wait for the bus. Wave to stop the bus!
notes.zh: 等车的地方。记得招手让司机停车！

translations.zh: 社区群聊 / 邻里 App 群

notes.en: WhatsApp or other app group for neighbours to share information about the neighbourhood, lost items or safety.
notes.zh: 邻居之间用来分享小区信息、丢失物品或安全提醒的聊天群（多为 WhatsApp）。

translations.zh: 邻里聚会 / 小区派对

notes.en: Event where neighbours come together in the street or square to eat, drink and talk.
notes.zh: 邻居们在街道或广场一起吃喝、聊天的活动。

notes.en: Place for neighborhood activities, often offering courses or multicultural markets.
notes.zh: 供社区居民进行活动、学习课程或举行文化聚会的地方。

notes.en: Volunteers in the neighbourhood who keep an eye on safety and report suspicious situations.
notes.zh: 社区志愿者关注治安、发现可疑情况会及时上报的制度或小组。

notes.en: The person checking tickets on the train.
notes.zh: 火车上查票的人。

notes.en: Cheaper travel times (usually 9:00-16:00 and after 18:30).
notes.zh: 票价更便宜的时段（通常9:00-16:00及18:30后）。

notes.en: What is the date today?
notes.zh: 今天几号？

notes.en: May 4th. Commemoration of all war dead. Two minutes of silence at 8 PM.
notes.zh: 每年 5 月 4 日。晚上 8 点默哀 2 分钟，纪念所有战争死难者。

notes.en: General action verb.
notes.zh: 通用的"做"。

notes.en: Consuming liquids.
notes.zh: 喝水/饮料。

notes.en: "Ik ben druk" (I am busy). "Het is druk" (It is crowded).
notes.zh: "Ik ben druk" (我好忙)。"Het is druk" (人好多)。

notes.en: "Durf jij dat?" (Do you dare?).
notes.zh: "Durf jij dat?" (你敢吗？)。

notes.en: Costs a lot of money.
notes.zh: 很花钱。

notes.en: Plural: "eieren".
notes.zh: 复数："eieren"。

notes.en: Consuming food.
notes.zh: 吃东西。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! It does NOT mean "eventually" (which is "uiteindelijk"). It means "maybe" or "potentially".
notes.zh: 假朋友！不等于 "eventually"(最终)。它的意思是"可能"或"如果有必要的话"。

notes.en: Your relatives.
notes.zh: 你的亲戚家人。

notes.en: It is a verb in Dutch! "Ik fiets naar werk".
notes.zh: 在荷兰语里是动词！"Ik fiets naar werk" (我骑车去上班)。

notes.en: Where you go when you have a flat tire ("lekke band").
notes.zh: 车胎爆了("lekke band")要去的地方。

notes.en: Not mandatory for adults, but recommended, especially for children.
notes.zh: 成年人不强制戴，但建议佩戴，尤其是小孩。

notes.en: Red asphalt lanes. DO NOT walk here.
notes.zh: 红色沥青路面。千万别在上面走路。

notes.en: Line of slow or standing cars; you often hear it in the traffic news (verkeersinformatie).
notes.zh: 高速或道路上缓慢或停着的一长排车辆，交通信息里常会提到。

notes.en: Not mandatory in NL, but appreciated (round up or ~10%).
notes.zh: 在荷兰不是强制的，但通常会凑整或给10%左右。

notes.en: Healthy snack.
notes.zh: 健康零食。

notes.en: Train signs are yellow.
notes.zh: 火车标志是黄色的。

notes.en: Used for birthdays, births, weddings, or passing an exam.
notes.zh: 用于生日、新生儿出生、结婚或考试通过等场合。

notes.en: "Gevaarlijk" is dangerous.
notes.zh: "Gevaarlijk" 是形容词"危险的"。

translations.zh: 温馨 / 热闹 / 惬意

notes.en: Quintessentially Dutch. Describes a nice atmosphere with people. No direct translation.
notes.zh: 荷兰文化代表词。形容温馨、社交、愉快的氛围。很难直译。

notes.en: The day before today.
notes.zh: 昨天。

notes.en: Low price.
notes.zh: 价格低。

notes.en: Dutch people love this word! It means it costs nothing.
notes.zh: 荷兰人最爱的词！意思是不要钱。

notes.en: Common weather colour.
notes.zh: 常见的天气颜色。

notes.en: Go (traffic light).
notes.zh: 行（红绿灯）。

notes.en: "Groenteboer" (greengrocer).
notes.zh: "Groenteboer" (菜贩)。

notes.en: Eaten on bread with butter for breakfast/lunch. Only in NL.
notes.zh: 撒在涂了黄油的面包上吃。荷兰特色早餐/午餐。

notes.en: 30 minutes.
notes.zh: 30分钟。

notes.en: You wear gloves when it is cold outside.
notes.zh: 天气很冷时戴在手上的保暖用品。

notes.en: One of the four seasons, often rainy and windy in the Netherlands.
notes.zh: 四季之一，荷兰的秋天常常又湿又有风。

notes.en: Always used with "niet" or "geen". "Je hoeft niet te betalen" (You don't have to pay).
notes.zh: 常搭配 "niet" 使用。"Je hoeft niet..." (你不需要...)。

notes.en: Work for school done at home.
notes.zh: 家庭作业。

notes.en: Beeping your card at the pole/gate. Don't forget!
notes.zh: 在读卡器上刷卡。别忘了！

translations.zh: 打卡进入 / 打卡退出 (公共交通)

notes.en: Mandatory use for the OV-Chipkaart (public transport card) when starting and ending a journey. Failure to check out results in overcharge.
notes.zh: 使用公共交通芯片卡 (OV-Chipkaart) 必须执行的操作，忘记打卡退出会被罚款或多收钱。

notes.en: "Gelukkig nieuwjaar!" (Happy new year!).
notes.zh: "Gelukkig nieuwjaar!" (新年快乐！)。

notes.en: "Regenjas" (raincoat). Essential.
notes.zh: "Regenjas" (雨衣)。必备。

notes.en: Piece of clothing for women.
notes.zh: 女士服装。

notes.en: Gouda cheese is famous. "Kaasschaaf" (cheese slicer).
notes.zh: 豪达奶酪很有名。"Kaasschaaf" (奶酪切片刀)。

notes.en: Place in the shop where you pay; you often hear "De volgende klant aan de kassa".
notes.zh: 商店里付款的地方，经常听到 "De volgende klant aan de kassa"（下一位顾客请到收银台）。

notes.en: "Kledingkast" (wardrobe) or "keukenkast" (kitchen cupboard).
notes.zh: "Kledingkast"(衣柜) 或 "keukenkast"(橱柜)。

notes.en: "TV kijken" (watch TV).
notes.zh: "TV kijken" (看电视)。

notes.en: Young person.
notes.zh: 小孩。

translations.zh: 家委 / 班级家长代表

notes.en: Parent who helps the teacher organise activities for the class, for example trips or parties.
notes.zh: 协助老师为班级组织活动（如郊游、班会）的家长代表。

notes.en: General term for clothes.
notes.zh: 衣服的总称。

notes.en: Useful when buying clothes or furniture: "Welke kleur wilt u?"
notes.zh: 买衣服或家具时常会问："Welke kleur wilt u?"（您要什么颜色？）。

notes.en: Tells you the time.
notes.zh: 看时间的工具。

notes.en: Where you keep your food fresh.
notes.zh: 保鲜食物的地方。

notes.en: "Koffie verkeerd" (coffee with lots of milk).
notes.zh: "Koffie verkeerd" (拿铁/牛奶咖啡)。

notes.en: Buying something in a shop.
notes.zh: 在商店买东西。

notes.en: Look for this word in supermarkets! "35% korting".
notes.zh: 超市里常见的词！"35% korting"。

notes.en: Paper or digital coupon that gives you a discount when you pay.
notes.zh: 纸质或电子的优惠券，付款时可以抵扣一部分金额。

translations.zh: 十字路口 / 交叉路口

notes.en: Place where two or more roads cross each other.
notes.zh: 两条或多条道路交汇的地方。

notes.en: Ability. "Ik kan fietsen".
notes.zh: 能力。"Ik kan fietsen"(我会骑车)。

notes.en: 15 minutes. "Kwart over..." (quarter past...).
notes.zh: 15分钟。"Kwart over..." (几点一刻)。

notes.en: Children must attend school from 5 to 16 years old.
notes.zh: 荷兰的义务教育年龄是 5 岁到 16 岁。

translations.zh: 好吃的 / 舒服的 / 好的

notes.en: Very versatile. Used for food, weather ("lekker weer"), sleep ("lekker slapen"), or even a feeling ("ik voel me niet lekker").
notes.zh: 非常万能。形容食物好吃、天气好("lekker weer")、睡得香("lekker slapen")，或身体舒服。

notes.en: Season with flowers and longer days; popular word because of tulips.
notes.zh: 春天百花盛开，白天变长，也和郁金香季节联系在一起。

notes.en: The teacher, often addressed as 'juf' (female) or 'meester' (male) in primary schools. Parents communicate with them about the child's progress.
notes.zh: 老师，在小学常被称为 'juf' (女) 或 'meester' (男)。

notes.en: "Luister goed" (Listen carefully).
notes.zh: "Luister goed" (仔细听)。

notes.en: January, February, etc.
notes.zh: 一月、二月等。

notes.en: Clothing size or shoe size; you can ask for a different size in a shop.
notes.zh: 衣服或鞋子的尺码，在店里可以说想要换个尺寸。

notes.en: To create something or fix something ("auto maken").
notes.zh: 创造某物或修理某物("auto maken")。

notes.en: Basket on your bike or in the supermarket to carry things.
notes.zh: 可以放在自行车上或超市里用来装东西的篮子。

notes.en: The most popular second-hand website in NL. Great for furnishing your house cheap.
notes.zh: 荷兰最火的二手交易网站。买家具很便宜。

notes.en: Dutch people drink a lot of milk.
notes.zh: 荷兰人喝很多牛奶。

notes.en: "Ik kom er meteen aan" (I'm coming right away).
notes.zh: "Ik kom er meteen aan" (我马上就来)。

notes.en: Underground or fast light rail, for example in Amsterdam and Rotterdam.
notes.zh: 地下或轻轨系统，例如阿姆斯特丹和鹿特丹的地铁。

notes.en: Used when you are not sure.
notes.zh: 表示不确定。

notes.en: Weather with low visibility; important when driving or cycling.
notes.zh: 能见度低的天气，开车或骑车时要格外小心。

notes.en: Most people in the Netherlands communicate via mobile phone and apps like WhatsApp.
notes.zh: 荷兰人主要通过手机和 WhatsApp 等应用联系彼此。

notes.en: Obligation. "Ik moet werken".
notes.zh: 义务。"Ik moet werken"(我得工作)。

notes.en: "Mag ik...?" (May I...?). Permission.
notes.zh: "Mag ik...?" (我可以...吗？)。表示请求许可。

notes.en: Can mean "tomorrow" or "morning". "Goedemorgen" (Good morning).
notes.zh: 可以是"明天"也可以是"早晨"。"Goedemorgen" (早上好)。

notes.en: Very important, especially for formal appointments or official visits. If you are late, you must call.
notes.zh: 在正式场合（如医院、面试）非常重要。如果迟到，必须打电话告知。

notes.en: Bus, train, metro, tram. You must check in (inchecken) and check out (uitchecken) with your OV-chipkaart.
notes.zh: 公共汽车、火车、地铁。必须使用 OV-chipkaart 打卡进入和打卡离开。

notes.en: Device you use to charge your phone, laptop or bike battery.
notes.zh: 给手机、电脑或电动自行车电池充电的设备。

notes.en: The national colour of the Netherlands (Royal House).
notes.zh: 荷兰的国家代表色（王室）。

notes.en: Evening at school where parents talk with the teacher about their child.
notes.zh: 学校组织的晚上家长会，家长和老师一起谈孩子的情况。

notes.en: Father and mother.
notes.zh: 爸爸妈妈。

translations.en: to ask the school for permission
translations.zh: 向学校请假 / 请求许可

notes.en: If a child needs to miss school for special reasons (e.g., family celebration, unusual vacation), parents must ask the school beforehand.
notes.zh: 如果孩子因特殊原因缺课（例如庆祝活动），家长必须事先向学校请假。

notes.en: The universal card for train, bus, tram, metro. Must check in AND out.
notes.zh: 通用于火车、巴士、电车、地铁。必须上下车都刷卡(check in/out)。

notes.en: Switching trains/buses. You usually check out and in again if changing operators (e.g. NS to Arriva).
notes.zh: 换乘火车/巴士。如果换运营商(如NS换Arriva)通常需要先出再进。

notes.en: Essential survival gear in NL.
notes.zh: 荷兰生存必备装备。

notes.en: Marked place where you may park your car, sometimes paid.
notes.zh: 画线允许停放车辆的地方，有时需要付费。

notes.en: A Christian holiday (christelijke dag), often celebrated with eating eggs.
notes.zh: 基督教节日，人们通常吃鸡蛋庆祝。

notes.en: Spice.
notes.zh: 香料。

notes.en: Literally "peanut cheese". Dutch people love it. DO NOT translate as "peanut cheese" to English speakers.
notes.zh: 字面意思是"花生奶酪"，其实是花生酱。荷兰人超爱。

notes.en: Paying with debit card (Maestro/V-Pay). Credit cards are often NOT accepted in supermarkets (AH).
notes.zh: 用借记卡支付。注意 Albert Heijn 超市通常不收信用卡(Credit Card)，只收储蓄卡。

notes.en: Small bag for your money and bank cards; don’t forget it when you go shopping.
notes.zh: 装现金和银行卡的小包，出门购物时别忘了带。

notes.en: Communicating with words.
notes.zh: 交谈。

notes.en: How much something costs; combine with "korting" and "aanbieding".
notes.zh: 东西的价钱，常和折扣 korting、特价 aanbieding 等词一起出现。

notes.en: Paper or digital report that shows how a child is doing at school.
notes.zh: 记录孩子在学校学习和表现情况的纸质或电子报告。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! "Een rare man" is a weird man, not a rare one. Rare (scarce) is "zeldzaam".
notes.zh: 假朋友！"Raar" 是奇怪，不是稀有。稀有是 "zeldzaam"。

notes.en: Instructions for how to cook a dish; many Dutch families share simple recepten.
notes.zh: 教你做菜的说明，很多家庭会互相分享简单的 recepten。

notes.en: Very common in the Netherlands; combine with "paraplu" and "regenjas".
notes.zh: 荷兰非常常见的天气，常和雨伞 paraplu、雨衣 regenjas 一起出现。

notes.en: Rain suit ("regenpak") is common for cyclists.
notes.zh: 骑行者常穿雨衣套装("regenpak")。

notes.en: "In de richting van..." (In the direction of...).
notes.zh: "In de richting van..." (朝...方向)。

notes.en: Not to be confused with "jurk".
notes.zh: 不要和"jurk"(连衣裙)混淆。

notes.en: Colour of danger or stop.
notes.zh: 危险或停止的颜色。

notes.en: Circular intersection where traffic drives around a central island.
notes.zh: 车辆绕中心岛行驶的圆形路口。

notes.en: Singular: "schoen".
notes.zh: 单数："schoen"。

translations.zh: 学校操场 / 校园广场

notes.en: Outside area of the school where children play during breaks.
notes.zh: 学校外面的活动区域，孩子在课间会到这里玩耍。

notes.en: Used for washing your hair; bought at the supermarket or drogist.
notes.zh: 用于洗头的洗发用品，可在超市或药妆店（drogist）购买。

notes.en: Worn around the neck in winter to keep warm.
notes.zh: 冬天围在脖子上保暖的衣物。

notes.en: Resting at night.
notes.zh: 晚上休息。

notes.en: Don't lose your house keys ("huissleutels")!
notes.zh: 别把家里的钥匙("huissleutels")弄丢了！

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! Not "slim" (thin). Thin is "dun" or "slank".
notes.zh: 假朋友！不是 "slim"(苗条)。苗条是 "dun" 或 "slank"。它是"聪明"的意思。

notes.en: False friend. Looks like "small", but means "narrow". Small is "klein".
notes.zh: 假朋友。看起来像 "small"，但意思是"窄"。小是 "klein"。

notes.en: Snow can make cycling and walking slippery.
notes.zh: 下雪时路面很滑，骑车和走路都要注意安全。

notes.en: Watch your speed ("maximumsnelheid").
notes.zh: 注意限速("maximumsnelheid")。

notes.en: Singular: "sok".
notes.zh: 单数："sok"。

translations.zh: 游乐场 / 儿童活动场

notes.en: Outdoor place with swings and slides where children can play.
notes.zh: 有秋千、滑梯等设施，供孩子玩耍的户外场所。

notes.en: Busy traffic time. "Ochtendspits" (morning rush) and "avondspits" (evening rush).
notes.zh: 交通繁忙时段。分为早高峰("Ochtendspits")和晚高峰("avondspits")。

notes.en: "De trein vertrekt van spoor 5". Pay attention to changes.
notes.zh: "火车从5号站台出发"。注意站台变更。

translations.zh: 体育俱乐部 / 运动协会

notes.en: Place where people play sports in their free time (vrije tijd). Members pay a contribution (contributie).
notes.zh: 人们在业余时间运动的社团。会员需要支付会费 (**contributie**)。

notes.en: Traditional winter dish. Mashed potatoes mixed with vegetables (kale, carrots) and sausage ("rookworst").
notes.zh: 传统冬日菜。土豆泥混合蔬菜(羽衣甘蓝、胡萝卜)配熏香肠。

notes.en: Deposit on plastic bottles and cans. Return them to the supermarket machine ("flessenautomaat").
notes.zh: 塑料瓶和罐头的押金。去超市机器("flessenautomaat")退回可拿钱。

notes.en: "Centraal Station" (CS) is the main station.
notes.zh: "Centraal Station" (CS) 是中央火车站。

notes.en: Part of the street where pedestrians walk; not for bikes.
notes.zh: 行人行走的路，一般不允许骑自行车。

notes.en: Lamp with red, orange and green lights that controls traffic.
notes.zh: 由红、黄、绿三色灯组成，用来控制交通的信号灯。

notes.en: "Tot straks!" means "See you in a bit!". "Later" usually means much further in the future.
notes.zh: 指"今天稍晚"或"不久后"。"Tot straks!" 是"一会儿见"。

notes.en: Sweetener.
notes.zh: 甜味剂。

notes.en: AH (Albert Heijn) and Jumbo are common.
notes.zh: AH (Albert Heijn) 和 Jumbo 很常见。

notes.en: You put toothpaste on your toothbrush to brush your teeth.
notes.zh: 刷牙时挤在牙刷上的牙膏。

notes.en: Can be a shopping bag, school bag or handbag.
notes.zh: 可以是购物袋、书包或手提包。

notes.en: Can be a landline or mobile phone, depending on the context.
notes.zh: 既可以指座机，也可以指手机，具体含义看上下文。

notes.en: "Kopje thee?" (Cup of tea?).
notes.zh: "Kopje thee?" (来杯茶吗？)。

notes.en: "Heb je tijd?" (Do you have time?).
notes.zh: "Heb je tijd?" (你有空吗？)。

notes.en: On your birthday, you buy cake/treats for your colleagues/classmates (you treat them).
notes.zh: 过生日时，通常是你自己买蛋糕或糖果请同事或同学吃。

notes.en: Common public transport in big cities like Amsterdam, The Hague and Rotterdam.
notes.zh: 阿姆斯特丹、海牙、鹿特丹等大城市常见的公共交通工具。

notes.en: NS trains connect most Dutch cities; you can sit in "stilte-coupé" (quiet carriage).
notes.zh: NS 火车连接大部分城市，还可以选择安静车厢（stilte-coupé）。

notes.en: Often digital now (OV-chipkaart or app), but the word is still used.
notes.zh: 虽然现在多用OV卡或App，但这个词还在用。

notes.en: Warm clothes for winter.
notes.zh: 冬天的保暖衣物。

notes.en: Crucial! If you forget, you lose ~20 euros deposit.
notes.zh: 非常重要！忘记刷下车会扣除约20欧押金。

notes.en: This day.
notes.zh: 今天。

notes.en: Important! Congratulate the person AND their family/friends. "Circle parties" are common.
notes.zh: 很重要！不仅祝贺寿星，还要祝贺ta的家人朋友。

notes.en: Cars, bikes, trams together.
notes.zh: 车流、人流的总称。

notes.en: "Vers brood" (fresh bread) or "verse groenten" (fresh vegetables).
notes.zh: "Vers brood"(新鲜面包) 或 "verse groenten"(新鲜蔬菜)。

notes.en: Common word for train travelers. "De trein heeft 5 minuten vertraging".
notes.zh: 坐火车常听到的词。"火车晚点5分钟"。

notes.en: Missing school (wegblijven van school). If this happens, parents can be fined. Parents must request permission (aan de school vragen) for special leave.
notes.zh: 无故缺课。家长可能因此被罚款。特殊情况必须事先向学校请假。

notes.en: "Ik vind het leuk" (I think it's nice) OR finding an object.
notes.zh: "Ik vind het leuk" (我觉得它不错) 或者找到东西。

notes.en: "Haring" (herring) is a Dutch snack.
notes.zh: "Haring"(鲱鱼)是荷兰特色小吃。

notes.en: "Rundvlees" (beef), "varkensvlees" (pork), "kip" (chicken).
notes.zh: "Rundvlees"(牛肉)，"varkensvlees"(猪肉)，"kip"(鸡肉)。

notes.en: "Mag ik iets vragen?" (Can I ask something?).
notes.zh: "Mag ik iets vragen?" (我能问个问题吗？)。

notes.en: "Ben je vrij?" (Are you off work? / Are you free?).
notes.zh: "Ben je vrij?" (你休息吗？/你有空吗？)。

notes.en: Used for parental contribution (ouderbijdrage) to school or non-paid work (vrijwilligerswerk).
notes.zh: 用于描述非强制性的捐款（如学校的杂费）或无偿工作。

notes.en: Unpaid work you do to help others or the community, for example in a buurthuis or sportvereniging.
notes.zh: 不拿工资、为了帮助他人或社区而做的工作，例如在社区中心或体育俱乐部当志愿者。

notes.en: Tap water ("kraanwater") is drinkable in NL.
notes.zh: 荷兰的自来水("kraanwater")可以直接喝。

notes.en: 7 days.
Red ("rode") or white ("witte").
notes.zh: 红酒("rode")或白酒("witte")。

notes.en: "Ik wil graag..." (I would like...).
notes.zh: "Ik wil graag..." (我想要...)。

notes.en: "Tegenwind" (headwind) is the cyclist's enemy. "Meewind" is rare luck.
notes.zh: "Tegenwind"(逆风)是骑车人的噩梦。

notes.en: "Winkelcentrum" (shopping center).
notes.zh: "Winkelcentrum" (购物中心)。

notes.en: Cold season; people wear a warm coat, scarf and gloves.
notes.zh: 一年中最冷的季节，人们会穿厚外套、围巾和手套。

notes.en: Opposite of black.
notes.zh: 黑色的反义词。

notes.en: Crucial verb. "Ik word oud" (I am getting old). Also used for passive voice.
notes.zh: 核心动词。"Ik word..." (我变得...)。也用于被动语态。

notes.en: Striped crossing where cars must stop for pedestrians.
notes.zh: 路面上画有条纹的行人过街线，车辆需要礼让行人。

notes.en: Solid or liquid soap for washing hands or body.
notes.zh: 固体或液体的香皂/洗手液，用来洗手或洗澡。

notes.en: "Wat zeg je?" (What do you say?).
notes.zh: "Wat zeg je?" (你说什么？)。

notes.en: Looking for something lost.
notes.zh: 找东西。

notes.en: Often used in "zomervakantie" (summer holiday).
notes.zh: 常见于 "zomervakantie"（暑假、暑期度假）。

notes.en: Seasoning.
notes.zh: 调味料。

notes.en: "Zwartrijden" (traveling without a ticket).
notes.zh: "Zwartrijden" (逃票)。

notes.en: Used for accepting something ("een baan aannemen") or hiring staff ("iemand aannemen").
notes.zh: 既可以指接受一份工作 (een baan aannemen)，也可以指公司录用员工 (iemand aannemen)。

notes.en: Opposite of "afwezig".
notes.zh: "Afwezig"(缺席)的反义词。

notes.en: Used both at work (finance department, HR) and in shops (clothing department, fruit & vegetables).
notes.zh: 既可指公司的财务部、人事部，也可指超市里的蔬果区、服装区等分区。

notes.en: Not being at work or school.
notes.zh: 没来上班或上学。

notes.en: Another word for arbeidsovereenkomst; describes your job conditions.
notes.zh: 和 arbeidsovereenkomst 类似的说法，写明你的工作条件和权利义务。

notes.en: Written agreement between employer and employee covering salary, hours, job duties (werkzaamheden), and whether it is fixed (vast) or temporary (tijdelijk).
notes.zh: 书面合同。规定工作时间、工资、内容和合同期限（固定或临时）。

notes.en: The times when you are expected to work, for example 9:00–17:00.
notes.zh: 你需要上班的时间段，例如 9:00–17:00。

notes.en: Requires employers to ensure a healthy and safe workplace.
notes.zh: 要求雇主确保员工拥有健康安全的工作场所的法律。

translations.zh: 企业医生 / 职业病医生

notes.en: Doctor who advises employer and employee about health at work.
notes.zh: 为雇主和雇员提供与工作相关健康建议的医生。

translations.zh: 评估面谈 / 考核谈话

notes.en: Meeting where your manager officially judges your work performance, sometimes linked to salary increase.
notes.zh: 上级正式评价你工作表现的谈话，有时会和加薪挂钩。

notes.en: Taking a course (cursus) to update your skills for your current job (e.g., learning new computer skills).
notes.zh: 为当前工作学习新技能，进行再培训。

notes.en: Salary before taxes (loonheffing) and premiums (like pension and unemployment insurance) are deducted.
notes.zh: 尚未扣除税金和保险的工资总额。

notes.en: Agreements about working conditions, salary, etc., made between employers and unions (vakbonden) for an entire sector.
notes.zh: 行业内雇主和工会达成的关于工作条件和工资的协议。

notes.en: People you work with.
notes.zh: 一起工作的人。

notes.en: Important tool for work, study and administration.
notes.zh: 工作、学习和处理行政事务时都离不开的工具。

notes.en: "Vast contract" (permanent) is gold for mortgages. "Tijdelijk" is temporary.
notes.zh: "Vast contract"(永久合同)对贷款买房很重要。

notes.en: Document with your work experience and education, used for job applications.
notes.zh: 记录你的工作经历和教育背景，用于求职的文档。

notes.en: Formal way of written communication for work, school and government.
notes.zh: 在工作、学校和政府场景中常用的正式书面沟通方式。

notes.en: "Werkervaring" (work experience).
notes.zh: "Werkervaring" (工作经验)。

translations.zh: 共享办公位 / 流动工位

notes.en: Workplace in the office that is not fixed for one person; employees choose a free desk each day.
notes.zh: 办公室里不固定分配给某一个人的工位，员工每天自由选择空位。

notes.en: Working around 36–40 hours per week.
notes.zh: 每周工作大约 36–40 小时。

translations.zh: 工作表现面谈 / 绩效沟通

notes.en: Planned talk between employee and manager about how the work is going and what can be improved.
notes.zh: 员工和上级之间约好的谈话，讨论工作情况和可以改进的地方。

notes.en: Place where many people work at desks with computers.
notes.zh: 很多人坐在电脑前工作的办公场所。

notes.en: Mandatory place to register a new business.
notes.zh: 在荷兰注册公司的强制性机构。

notes.en: The tax deducted from your gross salary (brutoloon). This includes income tax and national insurance contributions.
notes.zh: 从税前工资 (**brutoloon**) 中扣除的税款。

notes.en: Break in the middle of the day to eat lunch, often bread with cheese.
notes.zh: 中午的休息时间用来吃午饭，很多人吃面包配奶酪。

notes.en: FALSE FRIEND! Not a "map" (geographic). A map is "kaart" or "plattegrond". "Map" is a file folder.
notes.zh: 假朋友！不是地图 (kaart)。"Map" 是文件夹。

notes.en: The actual amount of money received in your bank account after all deductions.
notes.zh: 扣除所有税费和保险后实际到账的金额。

notes.en: Required when starting your own business (eigen zaak) and seeking funding from a bank or municipality.
notes.zh: 创建自己的公司时必需的文件，用于从银行或市政厅获得贷款。

notes.en: "Ontslag nemen" (quit) or "ontslag krijgen" (get fired).
notes.zh: "Ontslag nemen" 是辞职，"ontslag krijgen" 是被解雇。

notes.en: If dismissed, you must immediately write a letter disagreeing with the decision (niet eens zijn) and contact the UWV or the union.
notes.zh: 如果被解雇，必须立即写信表示不同意，并联系 UWV 或工会。

notes.en: Money you may receive from your employer when you are dismissed.
notes.zh: 被解雇时雇主可能需要支付给你的补偿金。

notes.en: Task you have to do.
notes.zh: 必须完成的任务。

notes.en: Your study or professional training.
notes.zh: 你的学历或职业培训。

notes.en: Formal clothing for men.
notes.zh: 男士正装。

notes.en: Extra hours worked. Sometimes paid, sometimes "tijd voor tijd" (time back).
notes.zh: 额外工作时间。有时给钱，有时调休("tijd voor tijd")。

notes.en: Working fewer hours than a full-time job, for example 16 or 24 hours.
notes.zh: 工作时间少于全职，例如每周 16 或 24 小时。

notes.en: Short break during work or school; you often drink coffee or tea.
notes.zh: 工作或上课中的短暂休息时间，常会喝杯咖啡或茶。

notes.en: Usually 1 or 2 months. Both sides can quit immediately.
notes.zh: 通常1-2个月。双方都可以随时解除合同。

translations.zh: 交通补贴 / 车费报销

notes.en: Money your employer gives you for the costs of travelling to work, for example by train or car.
notes.zh: 雇主为你上下班交通支出提供的补贴或报销，例如火车票、开车油费等。

notes.en: Work schedule or school timetable.
notes.zh: 工作排班或学校课表。

notes.en: Often paid monthly around the 24th. Don't forget "vakantiegeld" (holiday money) in May!
notes.zh: 通常每月发。别忘了5月份发的 "vakantiegeld" (度假金，通常是年薪的8%)！

notes.en: Paper or digital document that shows your salary and deductions each month.
notes.zh: 每月列出工资和各种扣款的纸质或电子文件。

notes.en: Letter you send when you apply for a job, together with your CV.
notes.zh: 应聘工作时随简历一起发送的求职信。

notes.en: Applying for a job. Interview is "sollicitatiegesprek".
notes.zh: 指应聘工作。面试是 "sollicitatiegesprek"。

notes.en: Period of practice at a company, often part of a study programme.
notes.zh: 在公司进行实践学习的一段时间，通常是学业的一部分。

notes.en: Person who is responsible for a small group of employees.
notes.zh: 负责带领一个小团队员工的负责人。

notes.en: Doing your job from home, usually with a laptop and internet.
notes.zh: 在家通过电脑和网络完成工作的方式。

notes.en: Money from gov if unemployed ("WW") or disabled ("WIA").
notes.zh: 失业("WW")或丧失劳动能力时政府发的钱。

notes.en: Making something clear.
notes.zh: 说明或解释。

notes.en: Agency that mediates temporary work (tijdelijk werk). They pay salaries and deduct taxes/premiums.
notes.zh: 提供临时工作的中介机构。他们负责支付工资和扣除税款/保险。

notes.en: System where you write down or enter the hours you have worked.
notes.zh: 记录你工作了多少小时的系统或表格。

notes.en: Amount of money you earn per hour of work.
notes.zh: 你每工作一小时可以获得的工资数额。

notes.en: Things you can do well.
notes.zh: 你会的技能。

notes.en: An open job position.
notes.zh: 招聘广告/职位空缺。

notes.en: Time off from work or school; you build up vakantiedagen each year.
notes.zh: 不上班不上学的休息时间，每年会累积一定的带薪假期（vakantiedagen）。

notes.en: Organization for employees. Negotiates with employers about salaries and conditions (CAO). Provides legal aid (juridische hulp) if you are a member.
notes.zh: 员工组织。与雇主协商集体劳动协议 (**CAO**)。提供法律援助。

notes.en: Dutch meetings can be long and involve lots of discussion ("polderen").
notes.zh: 荷兰会议可能很长，讨论很多("polderen"模式)。

notes.en: Room in the office where meetings and discussions take place.
notes.zh: 办公室里专门用于开会和讨论的房间。

notes.en: Days when you do not have to work, for example holidays or personal leave.
notes.zh: 不用上班的日子，例如节假日或个人请假。

notes.en: Normal day when you are expected to work, usually Monday to Friday.
notes.zh: 需要上班的日子，通常是周一到周五。

notes.en: Used when there is a lot of work and people feel stressed.
notes.zh: 指工作任务很多、员工感到压力很大的情况。

notes.en: The company or person who hires you.
notes.zh: 雇佣你的公司或人。

notes.en: Benefit for those who lost their job and worked for at least 6 months. Administered by the UWV. You get approximately 1 month of WW per year worked.
notes.zh: 失业金。如果你被解雇，向 **UWV** 申请。

notes.en: Person who works for the company.
notes.zh: 为公司工作的人。

translations.zh: 工作会议 / 员工商议

notes.en: A meeting to discuss and organize the work tasks (werkzaamheden).
notes.zh: 讨论工作安排和任务的会议。

notes.en: Obligation to inform your employer immediately when you are sick. You cannot have someone else call for you.
notes.zh: 生病时必须立即通知雇主。

notes.en: Calling your employer to say you are sick.
notes.zh: 打电话给雇主说生病了。

notes.en: Working without paying taxes and premiums. This is forbidden (verboden) and results in no benefits (ziektegeld, uitkering).
notes.zh: 不缴税和保险金工作。这是非法的，且生病或失业时无法获得任何津贴。

translations.zh: 厨房操作台 / 洗菜池

notes.en: The worktop in the kitchen, often with the sink built in: "het aanrecht schoonmaken" (clean the counter).
notes.zh: 厨房里带水槽的操作台，可说 "het aanrecht schoonmaken"（把台面擦干净）。

notes.en: Covers damage you accidentally cause to other people's property (e.g., your child breaks the neighbor's window).
notes.zh: 承保您无意中对他人财产造成的损害（例如，您的孩子踢球打破邻居的窗户）。

notes.en: Separating waste ("afval scheiden") is important (paper, glass, plastic, rest).
notes.zh: 垃圾分类("afval scheiden")很重要（纸、玻璃、塑料、其余）。

notes.en: Mandatory in the Netherlands (e.g., GFT, paper, glass).
notes.zh: 强制性垃圾分类（如 GFT 是果蔬园艺垃圾）。

notes.en: Local tax paid to the municipality for collecting and processing household waste. Low-income people can apply for remission (kwijtschelding).
notes.zh: 向市政厅支付的垃圾收集和处理费。低收入人群可申请豁免 (**kwijtschelding**)。

notes.en: Home that is part of a larger building, not a separate house.
notes.zh: 大楼里的一套住房，不是独立的整栋房子。

notes.en: Room with shower or bath, often combined with the toilet.
notes.zh: 有淋浴或浴缸的房间，常常和马桶在同一个空间。

notes.en: Small outside space attached to your apartment.
notes.zh: 连接在公寓上的小型室外空间，可以晒太阳或晾衣服。

notes.en: The person living in a house.
notes.zh: 住在房子里的人。

notes.en: Security deposit when renting a house.
notes.zh: 租房时的押金。

notes.en: Slot or box where the postman delivers letters at your house.
notes.zh: 邮递员把信件投递到你家的小箱子或门上的投信口。

notes.en: Special container for small chemical waste (Klein chemisch afval), such as paint, nail polish, batteries, and old medicines.
notes.zh: 用于投放涂料、指甲油、电池和旧药等小型化学垃圾的专用盒子。

notes.en: "Een dak boven je hoofd" means having a place to live.
notes.zh: 荷兰语表达 "een dak boven je hoofd" 意为“头上有个屋顶”，也就是有地方住。

notes.en: The company that supplies gas and electricity (gas en elektriciteit). You choose your own supplier.
notes.zh: 提供天然气和电力给您家里的公司。您可以自己选择。

translations.zh: 能源账单 / 水电煤气账单

notes.en: Bill for gas and electricity that you receive from the energy provider.
notes.zh: 能源公司寄来的燃气和电力费用账单。

notes.en: Tall building with many apartments.
notes.zh: 包含很多套公寓的高层楼房。

notes.en: GWL. Usually paid separately from rent ("exclusief").
notes.zh: 简称GWL。通常房租不包("exclusief")，需另付。

notes.en: Too much noise from neighbours or the street that bothers people.
notes.zh: 来自邻居或街道、让人感到困扰的噪音。

translations.zh: 公共区域 / 共享空间

notes.en: Space in a building that all residents may use, such as hallway or laundry room.
notes.zh: 楼里所有住户都可以使用的空间，比如走廊、洗衣房等。

notes.en: Specific green waste that must be separated from restafval.
notes.zh: 必须分类的绿色垃圾，包含蔬菜、水果和花园废物。

notes.en: Container for recycling empty glass bottles and jars (potten en flessen). Lids (deksels) are usually allowed, but never ceramics.
notes.zh: 回收空玻璃瓶和罐子的容器。盖子通常可以放入。

notes.en: Large waste items (like furniture, kapotte driezitsbank). Needs to be taken to a recycling center (milieustraat) or picked up by the municipality after making an appointment.
notes.zh: 体积大的垃圾（如家具、旧沙发）。需要预约市政厅回收或自行送去环保站。

notes.en: Person in an apartment building who keeps an eye on the building and sometimes helps with small problems.
notes.zh: 在公寓楼里负责打理大楼、处理一些小问题的管理员。

notes.en: Number on the front of the house, part of your official address.
notes.zh: 写在房子门口或门上的号码，是正式地址的一部分。

notes.en: False friend: looks like "hire". Use for houses/objects. Hiring a person is "aannemen".
notes.zh: 虽像 "hire" 但指租房/物。雇人是 "aannemen"。

notes.en: Owner of the rental property.
notes.zh: 房子的主人。

notes.en: Organization that helps resolve conflicts between tenants and landlords (huisbaas) over rent price or maintenance.
notes.zh: 帮助解决租户与房东之间关于租金或维修问题的机构。

notes.en: Read carefully before signing!
notes.zh: 签字前仔细阅读！

notes.en: The person who pays rent to the landlord (verhuurder).
notes.zh: 向房东（verhuurder）支付租金的人。

notes.en: Amount of money you pay every month for renting a house.
notes.zh: 你每个月为租房需要支付的金额。

notes.en: Yearly increase of the rent; tenants receive a letter about it.
notes.zh: 每年房租上涨时，房东会寄来说明涨价的信。

notes.en: Loan for a house. Interest ("rente") is tax deductible ("hypotheekrenteaftrek").
notes.zh: 买房贷款。利息("rente")可以退税("hypotheekrenteaftrek")。

notes.en: Subletting a house without permission from the landlord or housing corporation. This is forbidden.
notes.zh: 没有得到房东或房屋协会同意就转租房屋的行为，是违法的。

notes.en: Insurance for personal belongings inside the house (furniture, computer) against fire or theft. Not mandatory.
notes.zh: 房屋内部财物（如家具、电脑）的保险。在火灾或盗窃时赔付。

notes.en: Room where you cook; contains a cooker, fridge and kitchen cupboards.
notes.zh: 做饭的地方，通常有灶台、冰箱和橱柜。

notes.en: Person who helps you buy or sell a house. "Aankoopmakelaar" helps you buy.
notes.zh: 帮你买卖房子的人。"Aankoopmakelaar" 是买方中介。

notes.en: The reading on your gas/electricity meter. Must be reported annually for the yearly bill (jaarrekening).
notes.zh: 燃气或电表的读数。每年需要报告给能源公司，以计算年结单。

notes.en: Place where residents can bring large/bulky waste (grof vuil) or chemical waste (chemisch afval).
notes.zh: 居民可以丢弃大件或化学垃圾的地方。

notes.en: Required when signing the deed of sale (verkoopakte) for a house.
notes.zh: 买房时必须去公证处签署买卖契约。

notes.en: Repairs and upkeep of the house.
notes.zh: 房子的修理和保养。

notes.en: When a tenant rents the house (or a room) again to someone else.
notes.zh: 租户再把整套房子或其中一间房转租给别人的情况。

notes.en: Covers damage to the structure of the house (roof, walls). Mandatory if you have a mortgage.
notes.zh: 涵盖房屋结构本身的损失。如果你有房屋贷款，这是必须购买的。

notes.en: The official contract paper you receive from your insurance company (verzekering).
notes.zh: 您从保险公司收到的正式合同文件。

notes.en: Box at the post office where you can receive mail instead of at home.
notes.zh: 在邮局租用的信箱，用来代替寄到家里的信件。

notes.en: The interest (rente) paid on a mortgage can be claimed back from the Belastingdienst.
notes.zh: 房贷的利息部分可以从税务局获得退税。

notes.en: If you break something in a rented house.
notes.zh: 如果弄坏了租来的房子里的东西。

notes.en: Small separate building or room for bikes and tools.
notes.zh: 用于放自行车、工具等物品的小屋或储物间。

notes.en: Extra costs on top of rent for cleaning common areas, sometimes heating.
notes.zh: 房租之外的费用，用于清洁公共区域，有时包含暖气费。

notes.en: Room where you sleep; many Dutch houses have small slaapkamers.
notes.zh: 睡觉的房间，很多荷兰房子的卧室都比较小。

notes.en: If you have an outage, first check if the whole house is affected and ask neighbors before calling the utility company (0800-9009).
notes.zh: 停电时，先检查家里是否全停电并询问邻居。然后拨打故障热线 (0800-9009)。

notes.en: Small room with a toilet; in Dutch houses it is sometimes separate from the bathroom.
notes.zh: 只有马桶的小房间，在荷兰家庭里有时和浴室分开。

notes.en: Dutch houses often have steep stairs; be careful with children.
notes.zh: 荷兰很多住宅楼梯都比较陡，带孩子上下楼要特别小心。

notes.en: Outside area with grass or plants behind or in front of the house.
notes.zh: 房子前面或后面的室外区域，可以种草和花。

notes.en: A document from the municipality giving priority (voorrang) for housing due to severe circumstances (e.g., divorce with children, major health issues).
notes.zh: 市政厅出具的文件，允许在住房分配中获得优先权，通常仅在情况非常紧急时发放。

notes.en: "Ik ga verhuizen". Don't forget to inform the municipality.
notes.zh: "我要搬家了"。别忘了通知市政厅。

notes.en: The owner of the house who rents it out. Responsible for big repairs and major maintenance.
notes.zh: 将房屋出租的人。负责主要的维修和维护。

notes.en: Money you pay in advance, for example every month for energy, which is later corrected with the real costs.
notes.zh: 提前支付的一笔钱，例如每月预交的能源费用，之后会根据实际用量结算多退少补。

translations.zh: 等待名单 / 轮候名单

notes.en: Used when applying for social housing (sociale huurwoning) or sometimes child care (kinderopvang). Waiting times can be years, especially in large cities.
notes.zh: 申请社会租房或托儿服务时需要排队等待。在大城市可能等待数年。

notes.en: General word for a place where people live, such as an apartment or house.
notes.zh: 人们居住的地方的通用说法，可以是公寓也可以是独栋房子。

notes.en: Provides social rental housing (sociale huurwoning). Often requires registration and results in a long waiting list (wachtlijst).
notes.zh: 提供社会租房的机构。通常需要登记并进入等待名单 (wachtlijst)。

notes.en: Room where people sit, watch TV and receive visitors.
notes.zh: 家里用来坐着休息、看电视、接待客人的房间。

notes.en: Often used on forms to indicate which city or town you live in.
notes.zh: 表格上常见，用来填写你现在居住的城市或镇。

notes.en: General word for a place where people can live, such as a room, apartment or house.
notes.zh: 人们可以居住的空间的总称，例如房间、公寓或整套房子。

notes.en: Area of a town with many houses and few businesses.
notes.zh: 主要是住宅、商店较少的城区或街区。

notes.en: Space under the roof, often used for storage or an extra bedroom.
notes.zh: 屋顶下面的空间，常被用来储物或改成额外卧室。

notes.en: You can say "Ik heb een allergie voor pinda's" (I am allergic to peanuts).
notes.zh: 可以说 "Ik heb een allergie voor ..." 来表达“我对…过敏”。

notes.en: Where you pick up prescription medicine from your huisarts. Drugstore ("Drogist" like Kruidvat) is for shampoo/aspirin.
notes.zh: 拿处方药的地方。买洗发水或普通阿司匹林去 "Drogist" (如 Kruidvat)。

notes.en: "Arm gebroken" (broken arm).
notes.zh: "Arm gebroken" (断臂)。

notes.en: Chronic lung disease; important to mention to your huisarts.
notes.zh: 一种慢性呼吸系统疾病，向家庭医生说明自己有哮喘非常重要。

notes.en: Consultation hours at the GP or hospital that take place in the evening.
notes.zh: 家庭医生或医院在晚上提供的门诊时间。

notes.en: Plural: "benen". "Op de been zijn" (to be up and about).
notes.zh: 复数："benen"。"Op de been zijn" (恢复活动)。

notes.en: Medical care provided by a doctor.
notes.zh: 医生提供的治疗方案。

notes.en: What you say to someone who is sick.
notes.zh: 对生病的人说的祝福语。

notes.en: Unwanted effect of a medicine.
notes.zh: 药物的不良反应。

notes.en: You can have high or low blood pressure; measured with a cuff.
notes.zh: 可以是高血压或低血压，用袖带式仪器测量。

notes.en: You wear glasses to see better; sunglasses are "zonnebril".
notes.zh: 帮助看清楚的眼镜，太阳镜叫 "zonnebril"。

notes.en: "Buikpijn" (stomach ache).
notes.zh: "Buikpijn" (肚子痛)。

notes.en: Regular check at the huisarts, dentist or hospital.
notes.zh: 在家庭医生、牙医或医院做的定期检查或复查。

notes.en: Place where you can buy over-the-counter medicine (e.g., paracetamol, hoestdrank) without a prescription.
notes.zh: 可以无需处方购买非处方药（如止痛药、止咳糖浆）的地方。

notes.en: Feeling lightheaded.
notes.zh: 头昏眼花。

notes.en: "Eerste Hulp Bij Ongelukken"; many schools and companies offer EHBO-courses.
notes.zh: 全称 "Eerste Hulp Bij Ongelukken"，很多学校和公司都会提供 EHBO 急救课程。

notes.en: Mandatory amount you pay before insurance kicks in (usually ~€385/year).
notes.zh: 医保理赔前需自付的金额，通常每年约 385 欧。

translations.zh: 理疗师 / 物理治疗师

notes.en: Helps with movement problems (lopen, arm, nek, rug). Usually covered by supplementary insurance (aanvullende verzekering).
notes.zh: 帮助解决运动问题。通常需要额外保险 (**aanvullende verzekering**) 才能报销。

notes.en: Treatment by a fysiotherapeut to improve movement or reduce pain.
notes.zh: 由理疗师（fysiotherapeut）进行的治疗，帮助改善行动或减轻疼痛。

notes.en: Hard material around a broken arm or leg so it can heal.
notes.zh: 包在骨折手臂或腿上的硬石膏，用来固定骨头帮助恢复。

notes.en: More serious than a simple cold; sometimes you get a griepprik (flu shot).
notes.zh: 比普通感冒更严重，有时会接种流感疫苗（griepprik）。

notes.en: Specialist for women's health. You go here if there are medical problems during pregnancy, referred by the midwife.
notes.zh: 妇科专科医生。如果在怀孕期间出现医疗问题，由助产士转诊。

notes.en: "Hand geven" (shake hands).
notes.zh: "Hand geven" (握手)。

notes.en: Symptom where you cough; often together with verkoudheid or griep.
notes.zh: 咳嗽是一种常见症状，常常和感冒或流感一起出现。

notes.en: Liquid medicine you drink to reduce coughing; bought at drogist or apotheek.
notes.zh: 喝的止咳药水，可以在药妆店或药房购买。

notes.en: "Hoofdpijn" (headache).
notes.zh: "Hoofdpijn" (头痛)。

notes.en: First contact for ANY medical issue. Need referral ("verwijsbrief") for specialists.
notes.zh: 医疗首要联系人。看专科必须有家庭医生的转诊信("verwijsbrief")。

translations.zh: 夜间 / 周末家庭医生急诊点

notes.en: Place where you can see a GP in the evening or weekend for urgent problems, when your own huisarts is closed.
notes.zh: 在晚上或周末、自己家庭医生关门时，用于处理紧急但非危及生命问题的家庭医生急诊点。

notes.en: Building or group of huisartsen where you are registered.
notes.zh: 你注册所属的家庭医生诊所或多位家庭医生组成的合伙诊所。

notes.en: Small device that people with asthma use to inhale medicine.
notes.zh: 哮喘患者常用的小型吸入装置，用来吸入药物。

notes.en: Medicine that is put into your body with a needle.
notes.zh: 通过针头打入身体里的药物。

notes.en: Provides assistance for problems related to child upbringing (opvoeding), especially if a child is not listening or is having trouble.
notes.zh: 为儿童抚养问题提供帮助和咨询。如果孩子不听话或有行为问题，可向其寻求帮助。

notes.en: "Keelpijn" (sore throat).
notes.zh: "Keelpijn" (喉咙痛)。

notes.en: In medical context: what is bothering you.
notes.zh: 在医疗语境下指身体不适的症状。

notes.en: High body temperature.
notes.zh: 体温过高。

notes.en: In-home help from a kraamverzorgende for about a week after birth. Must be applied for early (5 months prior).
notes.zh: 分娩后一周内，护工（kraamverzorgende）会上门帮忙。需要提前申请。

notes.en: General word for medicines someone uses for a longer time.
notes.zh: 用于长期服用的药物的总称。

notes.en: Prescription drugs from apotheek.
notes.zh: 从药房拿的处方药。

notes.en: Feeling like you need to vomit.
notes.zh: 想吐的感觉。

notes.en: "Mond houden" (shut up - rude).
notes.zh: "Mond houden" (闭嘴 - 不礼貌)。

notes.en: "Verstopte neus" (blocked nose).
notes.zh: "Verstopte neus" (鼻塞)。

notes.en: Nausea in the morning, often during pregnancy.
notes.zh: 早晨感到恶心想吐，常见于怀孕早期。

notes.en: Plural: "ogen". "Oogarts" (eye doctor).
notes.zh: 复数："ogen"。"Oogarts" (眼科医生)。

notes.en: Plural: "oren". "Oorpijn" (earache).
notes.zh: 复数："oren"。"Oorpijn" (耳痛)。

notes.en: The Dutch doctor's solution to everything. "Take a paracetamol and come back in 2 weeks."
notes.zh: 荷兰神药。医生常说："吃点扑热息痛，两周后不好再来。"

notes.en: Small round medicine; you take it with water.
notes.zh: 小圆形的药，用水送服。

notes.en: "Rugpijn" (back pain). Very common.
notes.zh: "Rugpijn" (背痛)。很常见。

notes.en: Used in expressions like "spoedlijn" and "Spoedeisende Hulp".
notes.zh: 常见于 "spoedlijn"（紧急电话）和 "Spoedeisende Hulp"（急诊）。

notes.en: Hospital department for urgent cases (ernstig ongeluk, gebroken arm). Can be visited without appointment.
notes.zh: 医院的急诊部门。处理紧急情况（如骨折），无需预约。

notes.en: Special phone number of your GP practice for urgent medical questions during opening hours.
notes.zh: 家庭医生诊所用于白天处理紧急医疗问题的专用电话号码。

notes.en: In the Netherlands the national emergency number is 112.
notes.zh: 荷兰全国统一的紧急电话号码是 112。

notes.en: Doctor's consultation time. Usually by appointment only.
notes.zh: 医生看诊时间，通常需预约。

notes.en: Flat medicine in tablet form, similar to a pill.
notes.zh: 扁平的片剂药物，和 pill 类似。

notes.en: Not covered by basic insurance usually! Need extra insurance ("aanvullend").
notes.zh: 基本医保通常不报销！需要买附加险("aanvullend")。

notes.en: "Ik ben verkouden" (I have a cold).
notes.zh: "Ik ben verkouden" (我感冒了)。

notes.en: Primary caregiver for low-risk pregnant women, providing controls and assistance during delivery (bevalling).
notes.zh: 正常怀孕期间的主要护理人员，负责产检和分娩协助。

notes.en: The magic paper from your GP you need to see a specialist or go to hospital.
notes.zh: 家庭医生给的"通行证"，没有它看不了专科医生。

notes.en: You have 10 fingers.
notes.zh: 你有10根手指。

notes.en: You get vitamins from healthy food like fruit and vegetables or from supplements.
notes.zh: 可以从水果、蔬菜等健康食物，或补充剂中获得维生素。

notes.en: Plural: "voeten". "Te voet" (on foot).
notes.zh: 复数："voeten"。"Te voet" (步行)。

notes.en: Room where you wait before your appointment at the doctor or hospital.
notes.zh: 在医生诊所或医院等候看诊的房间。

notes.en: For cuts or open skin; you may need a plaster (pleister) or stitches.
notes.zh: 指皮肤破损的伤口，可能需要贴创可贴 (pleister) 或缝针。

notes.en: Material you put on a wound to protect it.
notes.zh: 覆盖在伤口上的敷料或绷带，用来保护伤口。

notes.en: Used when you feel tense before an exam, job interview or important talk.
notes.zh: 常用来形容考试、面试或重要谈话前的紧张心情。

notes.en: "Ik ben ziek". When calling in sick for work: "Zich ziek melden".
notes.zh: "我病了"。向公司请病假叫 "Zich ziek melden"。

notes.en: Emergency car that takes sick or injured people to the hospital. You call 112 in life‑threatening situations.
notes.zh: 把重病或受伤的人送往医院的救护车，生命危险时拨打 112。

notes.en: For emergencies or specialists.
notes.zh: 处理急诊或专科问题。

notes.en: Costs associated with health care, covered by the zorgverzekering.
notes.zh: 与医疗护理相关的费用。

notes.en: Mandatory for everyone living in NL.
notes.zh: 所有荷兰居住者强制购买。

notes.en: "Ik ben zwanger" (I am pregnant). In the Netherlands, pregnant women are often guided by a midwife (verloskundige).
notes.zh: 可以说 "Ik ben zwanger"（我怀孕了）。荷兰通常由助产士 (verloskundige) 跟进孕期。

notes.en: "Belastingaangifte" (tax return) or "aangifte doen bij politie" (report a crime).
notes.zh: 通常指 "Belastingaangifte"(报税) 或去警察局 "aangifte doen"(报案)。

notes.en: Form you fill in to register for school, a course or at the gemeente.
notes.zh: 用于在学校、课程或市政厅进行登记或报名时填写的表格。

notes.en: Special form you use to apply for a benefit or permit.
notes.zh: 用于申请补助、津贴或许可证的专门表格。

notes.en: You apply for a subsidy or permit ("toeslag/vergunning aanvragen").
notes.zh: 申请津贴或许可证("toeslag/vergunning aanvragen")。

notes.en: The process of managing official data. GBA (Gemeentelijke BasisAdministratie) is where personal data is registered.
notes.zh: 管理官方数据的过程。GBA是市政厅的公民基本档案系统。

notes.en: Crucial. You need an "afspraak" for everything (doctor, city hall). "Afspraak is afspraak" (deal is a deal).
notes.zh: 很重要。看医生、去市政厅都要预约。"Afspraak is afspraak" 意为"说话算话"。

notes.en: Letter or e-mail that confirms the date and time of your appointment.
notes.zh: 确认你预约的日期和时间的信件或电子邮件。

notes.en: Unable to work due to illness or injury. May qualify for a WIA benefit.
notes.zh: 因疾病或受伤而无法工作。可申请 WIA 津贴。

notes.en: Taxes. The "Belastingdienst" sends the dreaded blue envelopes ("blauwe brief").
notes.zh: 税。"Belastingdienst"(税务局)寄来的蓝色信封让人瑟瑟发抖。

notes.en: Government organisation that collects taxes and sends the famous blue envelopes.
notes.zh: 负责征税和寄出“蓝色信封”的政府机构。

notes.en: "Bewijs van inschrijving" (proof of registration).
notes.zh: "Bewijs van inschrijving" (注册证明)。

notes.en: If you do not agree with a decision from the gemeente or Belastingdienst, you can "bezwaar maken".
notes.zh: 如果不同意市政厅或税务局的决定，可以 "bezwaar maken"（提出书面异议）。

notes.en: For parking, speeding, or no light on bike.
notes.zh: 停车、超速或自行车没灯都会被罚。

notes.en: The head (hoofd) of the municipality (gemeente). Leads the municipal council (gemeenteraad) meetings. The position is not elected directly by the people.
notes.zh: 市政厅的首长。由市议会选举产生，而不是由市民直接选举。

notes.en: Refers to whether you are married, single, divorced, etc. Changes if you marry or divorce.
notes.zh: 指个人是否已婚、单身、离婚等状态。结婚或离婚时会发生变化。

notes.en: The unique number for tax, work, and healthcare. Everyone calls it "BSN".
notes.zh: 税务、工作和医疗必备的唯一号码。大家都叫它 "BSN"。

translations.zh: 联合政府 / 执政联盟

notes.en: Group of political parties that work together to form the government.
notes.zh: 几个政党合作组成的执政联盟，称为联合政府。

notes.en: Your online ID for government services. Everyone calls it "DigiD".
notes.zh: 用于登录政府服务的在线ID。大家都叫它 "DigiD"。

notes.en: Forbidden by the constitution (grondwet). Complaints can be filed at the Anti Discriminatie Bureau (ADB).
notes.zh: 在荷兰是禁止的。投诉可以提交给反歧视局（ADB）。

notes.en: General word for documents with boxes you have to fill in.
notes.zh: 需要填写各种信息的表格的通称。

notes.en: Local government. Go here for registration ("inschrijven"), ID, driving license.
notes.zh: 地方政府。去那里注册地址("inschrijven")、办身份证、驾照。

notes.en: Local taxes you pay to the municipality, for example for waste collection and water.
notes.zh: 向市政厅缴纳的地方税，例如垃圾处理费、自来水相关费用等。

translations.zh: 市政指南 / 市政手册

notes.en: Guide provided by the municipality with information about services, doctors, and local organizations.
notes.zh: 市政厅提供的指南，包含服务信息、医生和本地组织联系方式。

translations.zh: 市政厅 / 市政府办公楼

notes.en: Building where the gemeente works and where you go for many procedures.
notes.zh: 市政工作人员办公的地方，很多手续需要去那里办理。

notes.en: Members elected every 4 years. They decide on local issues like building schools or roads.
notes.zh: 每 4 年选举一次。决定地方事务，例如新建学校或道路。合法居住满 5 年的外国人可参与投票。

notes.en: A left-wing party that focuses heavily on the environment (milieu) and equal opportunities.
notes.zh: 左翼政党，重视环境（milieu）保护和缩小贫富差距。

notes.en: Basic rights in the Constitution, such as freedom of religion and freedom of speech.
notes.zh: 写入宪法中的基本权利，例如宗教自由、言论自由等。

notes.en: The most important law of the country, which describes the basic rules of the state and citizens' rights.
notes.zh: 一个国家最重要的法律，规定国家的基本制度和公民的基本权利。

notes.en: You need to put this at the bottom of contracts.
notes.zh: 合同底部必须签这个。

notes.en: Letter you receive if you forgot to pay a bill or respond to an earlier letter.
notes.zh: 如果你忘记付账单或没有回复之前的信件，就可能会收到的提醒或催缴信。

notes.en: Money received from the Belastingdienst for rent, depending on income and rent price.
notes.zh: 税务局根据收入和房租价格发放的住房补贴。

notes.en: Official ID document besides a passport or residence permit.
notes.zh: 除护照、居留卡之外的一种官方带照片身份证件。

notes.en: The process/exam to become integrated. Needed for PR or citizenship.
notes.zh: 融入考试。申请永居或入籍必须通过。

notes.en: Government agency handling visas and residence permits.
notes.zh: 处理签证和居留许可的政府机构。

notes.en: Number you receive when you are registered, for example at a housing corporation.
notes.zh: 在房屋协会等机构注册后获得的编号。

notes.en: Mandatory registering your address at the municipality. Illegal to live somewhere without it.
notes.zh: 在市政厅注册地址。必须做，否则违法 ("illegal onderhuur")。

translations.zh: 年度工资单 / 年结单

notes.en: Annual document from your employer or benefit provider showing total income and paid taxes. Used for tax declaration (belastingaangifte). Must be saved for 5 years.
notes.zh: 每年收到的收入和已缴税费总结。用于报税。必须保存 5 年。

notes.en: The right to vote in elections. In the Netherlands, most people have the right to vote from 18 years old.
notes.zh: 在选举中投票的权利。荷兰人大多从 18 岁起拥有选举权。

notes.en: Quarterly allowance paid to parents for each child up to 18 years old, managed by the SVB (Sociale Verzekeringsbank).
notes.zh: 每季度发放的津贴，支付给有 18 岁以下子女的父母，由 SVB 管理。

notes.en: Often you must send a copy of your ID or contract.
notes.zh: 很多手续需要提供身份证或合同的复印件。

notes.en: Money you pay to the gemeente for handling an application, for example for a passport.
notes.zh: 为办理护照等事项向市政厅支付的手续费用。

notes.en: ID card/passport. Mandatory to carry from age 14 ("toonplicht").
notes.zh: 身份证/护照。14岁以上必须随身携带("toonplicht")。

notes.en: The desk at the municipality where you ask questions.
notes.zh: 市政厅的办事柜台。

notes.en: "Melding maken" (to report an issue).
notes.zh: "Melding maken" (报告问题)。

notes.en: Place to report discrimination complaints.
notes.zh: 举报歧视的地方，如 Anti Discriminatie Bureau (ADB)。

notes.en: The leader of the Dutch government. He or she leads the ministers.
notes.zh: 荷兰政府的领袖，负责领导各个部长。

notes.en: On forms you often must fill in your nationality.
notes.zh: 在各种表格中，经常需要填写自己的国籍。

notes.en: Applying for Dutch citizenship. Requires passing the inburgeringsexamen.
notes.zh: 申请荷兰国籍。需要通过融入考试 (inburgeringsexamen)。

notes.en: Official list that is open for everyone to check, for example company details.
notes.zh: 任何人都可以查阅的官方登记列表，例如公司登记信息。

notes.en: Political parties that are not in the government and often criticise the coalition.
notes.zh: 没有进入政府、通常对执政联盟提出批评的政党。

notes.en: The original document, not a copy; sometimes you must show it at the gemeente.
notes.zh: 文件的原始版本，不是复印件，有时需要带去市政厅出示。

notes.en: Small official photo used for IDs, driving licence and OV-chipkaart.
notes.zh: 用于身份证、驾照、公交卡等的标准小照片。

notes.en: Travel document. Keep it safe.
notes.zh: 旅行证件。妥善保管。

notes.en: Organizations people can vote for. They have different ideas (left/links or right/rechts).
notes.zh: 人们可以投票选举的组织。分为左翼、右翼和中间党派。

notes.en: Four digits plus two letters in Dutch addresses, for example 1234 AB.
notes.zh: 荷兰地址中的邮编格式是 4 位数字 + 2 个字母，例如 1234 AB。

notes.en: Third Tuesday of September. The King travels to the Binnenhof in the Gouden Koets to read the Troonrede.
notes.zh: 每年 9 月的第三个星期二，国王乘坐金色马车（gouden koets）前往议会宣读政府计划。

notes.en: Elected member of the Gemeenteraad.
notes.zh: 市议会（Gemeenteraad）的成员。

notes.en: The ministers and the prime minister (minister-president) who govern the country.
notes.zh: 由首相（minister-president）和各部长组成、负责治理国家的机构。

notes.en: "Bankrekening" (bank account). In a restaurant: "Mag ik de rekening?" (Can I have the bill?).
notes.zh: "Bankrekening"(银行账户)。餐厅里说 "Mag ik de rekening?" (买单)。

notes.en: Valid for 10 years usually. Can also be used as ID in some cases.
notes.zh: 通常有效期10年。某些情况下可作身份证使用。

notes.en: Often another word for gemeentehuis, especially in bigger cities.
notes.zh: 在大城市里常用来指市政厅，与 gemeentehuis 含义接近。

notes.en: Place where you go to cast your vote on election day. You must bring your ID and your voting card (stempas).
notes.zh: 选举日去投票的地方。需要带身份证和投票卡（stempas）。

notes.en: Dutch nationals aged 18+ have the right to vote (actief kiesrecht). Non-nationals living legally for 5 years can vote for the Gemeenteraad.
notes.zh: 投票。18岁以上荷兰人有选举权。合法居住满 5 年的外国人可投票选举市议会。

notes.en: Official card you receive at home before an election. You must show it at the stembureau to vote.
notes.zh: 选举前邮寄到家中的官方投票卡，去投票站（stembureau）时必须出示。

notes.en: Organisation that pays child benefit (kinderbijslag) and AOW pensions.
notes.zh: 负责发放儿童金 (kinderbijslag) 和 AOW 养老金的机构。

notes.en: Government financial help: "zorgtoeslag" (health), "huurtoeslag" (rent).
notes.zh: 政府补助：如 "zorgtoeslag"(医保津贴)、"huurtoeslag"(房租津贴)。

notes.en: The King reads the government's plans for the next year on Prinsjesdag (third Tuesday of September).
notes.zh: 在王子日（9 月第三个星期二），国王宣读政府下一年的计划。

notes.en: Government agency that handles unemployment benefits and some disability benefits.
notes.zh: 负责办理失业金和部分伤残津贴的政府机构。

notes.en: The ID card that proves you are allowed to live in NL.
notes.zh: 证明你可以在荷兰居住的证件（ID卡）。

notes.en: For building, parking, or staying ("parkeervergunning").
notes.zh: 如建筑许可、停车许可("parkeervergunning")。

notes.en: Voting event. Elections are held every 4 years for the Tweede Kamer and Gemeenteraad.
notes.zh: 投票活动。例如每 4 年举行一次的国会二院和市议会选举。

notes.en: To extend the validity of documents like a driver's license (rijbewijs) or passport.
notes.zh: 延长文件（如驾照或护照）的有效期。

notes.en: Literally "wait word". Essential for logging into websites.
notes.zh: 字面意是"等待词"。登录网站必备。

notes.en: Changing your data or address.
notes.zh: 修改数据或地址。

translations.zh: 医疗津贴 / 医保补贴

notes.en: Money received from the Belastingdienst to help pay health insurance premiums, depending on income.
notes.zh: 税务局根据收入发放的补贴，用于支付医疗保险费。
